objects.specification: A large thin rectangular floor slab in a neutral tone with a subtle polished concrete texture, defining the base space of the fair booth.
A tall vertical rectangular panel in a bright contrasting color forming the front boundary, featuring a large central rectangular entrance opening with no door for easy access.
A tall vertical rectangular panel in a bright contrasting color forming the back boundary of the booth.
A tall vertical rectangular panel in a bright contrasting color forming the left boundary of the booth.
A tall vertical rectangular panel in a bright contrasting color forming the right boundary of the booth.
A prominent rectangular registration desk in a vibrant complementary color, with smooth edges and a minimalistic modern style.

children.specification: A bold flat sign panel mounted on the front edge of the desk, displaying the fair booth's name in large modern lettering.
